mapper.select: SELECT account_info.aid, account_info.name, account_info.gander, account_info.tel, account_info.avatar, account_info.email, account_info.address, account_info.zip_code, enterprise.eid, enterprise.name AS enterprise_name, enterprise.legal_person, enterprise.tel AS enterprise_tel, enterprise.social_code, enterprise.address AS enterprise_address, enterprise.zip_code AS enterprise_zipCode, role.rid, role.name AS role_name, role.memo, role.del, account.aid AS account_aid, account.username, account.password, account.ban, account.del AS account_del, account.memo FROM account_info JOIN account ON account.aid = account_info.aid JOIN enterprise on enterprise.eid = account_info.eid JOIN role ON role.rid = account_info.rid WHERE account_info.aid = #{accountId}
